verbs.description: [ARG0: The poster] [V: shows] [ARG1: President Trump on his knees in an orange jumpsuit with an ISIS fighter about to cut his throat] , [ARGM-TMP: while the city of New York burns in the background] .
The poster shows President Trump on his knees in an orange jumpsuit with [ARG0: an ISIS fighter] about to [V: cut] [ARG1: his throat] , while the city of New York burns in the background .
